languages.text: For one round, the Warrior becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for every enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by their melee attacks. Also, the Warrior gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: На 1 раунд воин становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для каждого противника, которому он нанес {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, совершив атаку в ближнем бою. Также воин получает +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и +2 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} урона до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: For one round, the Fighter becomes the priority target for every enemy hit by their melee attacks. Also, the Fighter gains +20% parry and +2 deflection until the end of combat.
For one round, the Fighter becomes the priority target for every enemy hit by their melee attacks. Also, the Fighter gains +20% parry and +2 deflection until the end of combat.

For one round, the Warrior becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for every enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by their melee attacks. Also, the Warrior gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat.

For one round, the Warrior becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for every enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by their melee attacks. Also, the Warrior gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: 在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，只要{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}了敌人，战士就会成为该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}。此外，战士还会获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}与+2{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: For one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for every enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. Also, the Warrior gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，只要战士的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}了敌人，战士就会成为该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}。此外，战士还会获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}与+2{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Durante un asalto, el guerrero se convierte en {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} para cada enemigo al que {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g} con un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo. Además, el guerrero obtiene +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: For one round, the Warrior becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for every enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by their melee attacks. Also, the Warrior gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Durante un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el guerrero se convierte en {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} para cada enemigo al que {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g} con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. Además, el guerrero obtiene +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}だけ、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}させた敵の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}になる。また、戦闘終了まで、ファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が+20%、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}が+2増加する。
languages.original_text: For one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for every enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. Also, the Warrior gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}だけ、ファイターが{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}させた敵の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}になる。また戦闘終了まで、ファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が+20%、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}が+2増加する。

languages.text: На 1 раунд воин становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для каждого противника, которому он нанес {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, совершив атаку в ближнем бою. Также воин получает +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и +2 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} урона до конца боя.
languages.original_text: For one round, the Warrior becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for every enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by their melee attacks. Also, the Warrior gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} боец становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для каждого противника, которому он нанес {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g}, совершив {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}. Также боец получает +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и +2 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} урона до конца боя.

На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} боец становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для каждого противника, которому он нанес {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g}, совершив {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}. Также боец получает +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и +2 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} урона до конца боя.

languages.text: Der Krieger wird für eine Runde zum {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} jedes Feindes, bei dem er einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit seinen Nahkampfangriffen landet. Darüber hinaus erlangt der Krieger bis zum Ende des Kampfes +20 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und +2 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}.
languages.original_text: For one round, the Warrior becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for every enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by their melee attacks. Also, the Warrior gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Der Krieger wird für eine {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} zum {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} jedes Feindes, bei dem er einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit seinen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffen{/g} landet. Darüber hinaus erlangt der Krieger bis zum Ende des Kampfes +20 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und +2 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}.

languages.text: Pendant un round, le guerrier devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} de tous les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} par ses attaques de mêlée. De plus, le guerrier bénéficie de +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et de +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: For one round, the Warrior becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for every enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by their melee attacks. Also, the Warrior gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Pendant un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, le Combattant devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} de tous les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchés{/g} par ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g}. De plus, le Combattant bénéficie de +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et de +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
